response.original_title: The Victims (or 100 and some days in MAGA America)
response.overview: An exploration of the lives of six queer Michigan teens during the first 100 days of Trump's second term and the effect the Trump administration has had upon Michigan. The film also recounts Trump's first 100 days in office rally that took place within the state.
response.title: The Victims (or 100 and some days in MAGA America)
